title: Commerce officials heading to China to lay groundwork for possible Raimondo trip later this year, sources say
description: Officials from the Department of Commerce will travel to Beijing and Shanghai to lay groundwork for a potential trip by Secretary Gina Raimondo, sources say.

title: Major trading platform CEO sees signs of a bond ETF revival
description: Two market experts find flows into bond ETFs are picking up following a lull.

title: 1 in 3 people would quit for a 4-day workweek job, according to a new report
description: The four-day workweek is gaining momentum, and people say they're willing to quit to have it.

title: Job growth totals 236,000 in March, near expectations as hiring pace slows
description: The Labor Department reported Friday that payrolls grew by 236,000 for the month, compared to the Dow Jones estimate for 238,000.

title: S&P 500 futures and Treasury yields gain on Friday as March labor report shows resilient economy
description: Friday's jobs report runs counter to that weak data and is likely to divide investors.

title: Here's a decade-by-decade guide to building wealth
description: Don't let market volatility and recession fears stop you from taking steps to build your wealth. Here's what you should be doing in your 20s, 30s and beyond.

title: Treasury yields tick up ahead of U.S. jobs report, with many markets closed for holiday
description: U.S. Treasury yields moved higher as investors await the U.S. jobs report and market sentiment on possibly reactions from the Federal Reserve.

title: China's recovery is taking longer than expected, so Citi is pushing back its stock rebound forecasts
description: Earnings from Chinese e-commerce giants JD.com and Alibaba have also indicated that consumers remain conservative about spending.

title: Tesla nominates ex-CTO JB Straubel to board of directors
description: Tesla has nominated former CTO JB Straubel to join its board of directors, according to a proxy filing out Thursday.
